title: "Google ML Kit SDK Now Focuses on On-Device Machine Learning"
excerpt: "Google has introduced a new ML Kit SDK aimed to work in standalone mode without requiring a tight integration with Firebase, as the original ML Kit SDK did. Additionally, it provides limited support for replacing its default models with custom ones for image labeling and object detection and tracking."
